tweet: Today I join colleagues to support inclusion of Taiwan in 72nd session of World Health Assembly. Taiwan has proven its dedication to international health cooperation & has been a reliable partner of U.S. in global health research. Barring them from WHO will come at expense to all
.@POTUS @SecPompeo We cannot turn a blind eye to the 3 million civilians living in the Idlib Province. We cannot allow these brutal aerial attacks to continue. https://wapo.st/2Q5YH2p

Hospitals aren't weapons caches.
Civilians aren't targets.
Doctors aren't terrorists.
3+million Syrians are at risk as Assad, Russia, & Iran escalate aerial attacks on hospitals, schools, & civilian areas. The U.S must step up and lead international efforts to stop the assault.

Nearly half of all Americans work for a small business. In celebration of #NationalSmallBusinessWeek we honor our hardworking small business men and women. I am proud to champion the thousands of small businesses and the hundreds of thousands of Texans working at them in #TX15.

Attention South Texans! Starting this month until the end of August, @Allegiant Airlines, will provide direct flights to Orlando, Florida, Orlando/Sanford airport. The airline will also provide flights to Los Angeles, California (LAX) starting in June. https://bit.ly/2VUAukZ

I am a proud cosponsor of #HR95, the Homeless Veteran Families Act which addresses homelessness among veterans and their families by providing transitional housing, employment assistance, and other necessary support services.

Today is Yom Hashoah, a day in which we reflect on the atrocious actions and the lives lost during the Holocaust. Over 6 million Jews. May we never forget this terrible time in history and be able to move forward with peace, unity, and prosperity. #HolocaustRemembranceDay pic.twitter.com/D3XWzlVNZX

I was proud to learn last night that Edgar Baltazar Garcia had been released from the Port Isabel Detention Center. I will continue to fight for deported veterans and urge my colleagues to support my bill, the Repatriate Our Patriots Act. https://bit.ly/2IR2qQg

I have filed a private bill to allow veteran Edgar Baltazar Garcia to receive an immigration visa or adjustment of status under the Immigration and Nationality Act. I stand for Mr. Garcia and other veterans like him. We must do what is just and right. https://bit.ly/2J8iZqr
